channel.title: jsdelivr on Loving life and dreams.
channel.description: Recent content in jsdelivr on Loving life and dreams.

item.title: Replace jsdelivr with unpkg as the CDN provider
item.description: A few days ago, I saw netizens discussing that the jsdelivr service was blocked. It may be because of the beginning. At that time, I found that my site was normal, but it was not strong. I was also facing the failure of loading jsdelivr resources for a few days. After some investigation, it is found that the affected part is still relatively small. At least at that time, the CSS file of the site was not hosted on the CDN.
